member.name: M:MotorEmpireAutohaus.Misc.Authentication.AuthValidation.ArePasswordsMatching(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the password matches its password confirmation field
member.param: password-The initial password

member.returns: True, if the password matches its confirmation, False otherwise

member.summary: Animates the TextColor of an to the given color
member.param: The target color to animate the to
